entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
